UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Resurrecting inactive antimicrobial peptides from the lipopolysaccharide trap.
Literature.Author: Mohanram H, Bhattacharjya S

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli(MIC=100µM),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=200µM),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=200µM),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Typhimurium ATCC 14028(MIC=>200µM),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=50µM),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=50µM),Streptococcus pyogenes ATCC 19615(MIC=100µM),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=100µM)
